about_dishes: What do you eat? Get an overview and suggestions.
about_intro: {{brand}} is an app to help you keep track of what {{who}} eat. Save your meals to help you in your everyday life.
about_meals: Save your meals, what you eat and when.

about_page.lead: {{brand}} exists to help you keep track of what you eat. When the inspiration falthers and the question: -What are we going to eat today? hangs in the air, maybe you can find something here.
about_page.p1: The purpose of this page is to allow you to quickly and easily keep track of what you eat. You can then see your history, search and find what you have eaten.

click_here_to_add: Click here to add a meal

legal_page.cookie_lead: So what information do we save about you?
legal_page.cookie_text_1: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer when you visit a website. We use cookies to remember your login and save who you are. In addition, Google's cookies are used to investigate the use of the site.
legal_page.cookie_text_2: You can change your preferences and reject certain types of cookies stored on your computer from this web page in your browser. You can also delete all cookies that are already stored on your computer, but remember that deleting cookies can prevent you from using parts of the website.
legal_page.cookie_text_3: If you have any questions or concerns about this, get in touch.
